entry.title: Talk:Desert Festival
entry.summary:
Food Vendor Stacks: new section

← Older revision Revision as of 07:31, 11 April 2024
Line 143: Line 143:
 
And is this frame rate dependent? [[User:JackBlack69|JackBlack69]] ([[User talk:JackBlack69|talk]]) 22:32, 7 April 2024 (UTC)
 
And is this frame rate dependent? [[User:JackBlack69|JackBlack69]] ([[User talk:JackBlack69|talk]]) 22:32, 7 April 2024 (UTC)
 
:Checking some more, the game usually runs at 60 frames per second, making EscarGo slower, and the slowdown process is basically irrelevant. If it would run at 6-20 frames per second, it would be more luck based. But this is primarily due to the different speeds involved, not the different boost times. [[User:JackBlack69|JackBlack69]] ([[User talk:JackBlack69|talk]]) 23:16, 9 April 2024 (UTC)
 
:Checking some more, the game usually runs at 60 frames per second, making EscarGo slower, and the slowdown process is basically irrelevant. If it would run at 6-20 frames per second, it would be more luck based. But this is primarily due to the different speeds involved, not the different boost times. [[User:JackBlack69|JackBlack69]] ([[User talk:JackBlack69|talk]]) 23:16, 9 April 2024 (UTC)
 +
 +
== Food Vendor Stacks ==
 +
 +
So food from the food vendor stacks with normal food and drinks, allowing total boosts like +6 luck (which is great for the casino!) and +3 speed overall [[User:Rangerbookwyrm|Rangerbookwyrm]] ([[User talk:Rangerbookwyrm|talk]]) 07:31, 11 April 2024 (UTC)

entry.title: Pine Tree
entry.summary:
Stipulated that a tree outside of the farm will not grow back if there is an item on the tree's tile.

← Older revision Revision as of 06:42, 11 April 2024
Line 11: Line 11:
 
Chopping a stage 2–3 tree with an [[Axes|axe]] has a chance to drop one [[wood]], depending on foraging level. This doesn't happen when cutting it with other [[tools]].
 
Chopping a stage 2–3 tree with an [[Axes|axe]] has a chance to drop one [[wood]], depending on foraging level. This doesn't happen when cutting it with other [[tools]].
  
−
Pine Trees outside the farm (except in [[Pelican Town]]) can be chopped down or tapped.  These trees will respawn as Stage 3 saplings (20% chance each day) and grow as normal after that, as long as the stump is removed.
+
Pine Trees outside the farm (except in [[Pelican Town]]) can be chopped down or tapped.  These trees will respawn as Stage 3 saplings (20% chance each day) and grow as normal after that, as long as the stump is removed, and there is nothing on the tree's tile.
  
 
==Stages of Growth==
 
==Stages of Growth==

entry.title: Spring Onion Mastery
entry.summary:
Fixed a typo

← Older revision Revision as of 06:31, 11 April 2024
Line 8: Line 8:
 
To obtain Spring Onion Mastery, the player must first earn 8 hearts of [[friendship]] with both [[Jas]] and [[Vincent]], then trigger a cutscene by entering [[Cindersap Forest]] during [[Spring]] on a sunny day between 6am and 5pm.  A cutscene will play, during which Vincent shows the player how to clean Spring Onions by removing insects.
 
To obtain Spring Onion Mastery, the player must first earn 8 hearts of [[friendship]] with both [[Jas]] and [[Vincent]], then trigger a cutscene by entering [[Cindersap Forest]] during [[Spring]] on a sunny day between 6am and 5pm.  A cutscene will play, during which Vincent shows the player how to clean Spring Onions by removing insects.
  
−
Once obtained, it can be found in the [[Special Items & Powers]] Menu on as one of the pause menu tabs.
+
Once obtained, it can be found in the [[Special Items & Powers]] Menu on one of the pause menu tabs.
  
 
==History==
 
==History==

entry.title: Jewels Of The Sea
entry.summary:
Removed inaccurate info, Legendary Fish II can be caught multiple times

← Older revision Revision as of 06:27, 11 April 2024
Line 22: Line 22:
 
==Trivia==
 
==Trivia==
 
*The power from this book can result in the player receiving types of roe which are otherwise unobtainable, namely [[Fish#Legendary Fish|Legendary Fish]], [[Fish#Legendary Fish II|Legendary Fish II]], [[Squid]], and [[Midnight Squid]] roes.
 
*The power from this book can result in the player receiving types of roe which are otherwise unobtainable, namely [[Fish#Legendary Fish|Legendary Fish]], [[Fish#Legendary Fish II|Legendary Fish II]], [[Squid]], and [[Midnight Squid]] roes.
−
 
+
**Since Legendary Fish can only be caught once per save file, or per player in [[Multiplayer]], the [[Roe]] associated with each Legendary Fish can also only be obtained once per player per save file.
−
*It is also important to mention that since Legendary Fish and Legendary Fish II can only be caught once per save file, or per player save in [[Multiplayer]], the [[Roe]] associated with them also can only be obtained once per save file per Legendary Fish.
 
  
 
==References==
 
==References==

entry.title: Ghost
entry.summary:
Strategy

← Older revision Revision as of 04:36, 11 April 2024
Line 18: Line 18:
  
 
==Strategy==
 
==Strategy==
−
Stand still and swing at it with a club or a sword right before it hits you. High-damage but slow weapons are more efficient than quick, low-damage weapons such as daggers. Ghosts are knocked back several tiles after being hit, so walking towards them may speed up the process of killing them. Otherwise, wait until they slowly float back towards you for another strike.
+
Stand still and swing at it with a club or a sword right before it hits you. High-damage but slow weapons are more efficient than quick, low-damage weapons such as daggers. Ghosts are knocked back several tiles after being hit, so walking towards them may speed up the process of killing them. Low weight weapons like daggers reduce this knockback, and the dagger special ability locks any affected enemy in place while in effect, dealing multiple hits without needing to chase it down or wait for it. Otherwise, wait until they slowly float back towards you for another strike.
  
 
==Notes==
 
==Notes==

entry.title: Random Events
entry.summary:
Strange Capsule: Added information on the breaking of strange capsule

← Older revision Revision as of 04:04, 11 April 2024
Line 58: Line 58:
 
After Year 1, there's a 0.8% chance of the strange capsule event being chosen. The event does something only if a randomly chosen tile on the farm is clear and allows item placement. It will emit a small amount of light when placed. In the morning, a message is shown saying "A strange sound was heard in the night..."
 
After Year 1, there's a 0.8% chance of the strange capsule event being chosen. The event does something only if a randomly chosen tile on the farm is clear and allows item placement. It will emit a small amount of light when placed. In the morning, a message is shown saying "A strange sound was heard in the night..."
  
−
A unique <samp>UFO</samp> sound effect plays, and a Strange Capsule appears on a random tile of the farm.<ref name="strangecapsule" /> The strange capsule can be picked up and placed around the farm. It turns into a broken Empty Capsule after about three days, which enables a [[Secrets#Strange Capsule|further Easter egg]]. It can also turn into a broken Empty Capsule if applied with [[Fairy Dust]]. Once this event has happened in a save file, it cannot happen again.
+
A unique <samp>UFO</samp> sound effect plays, and a Strange Capsule appears on a random tile of the farm.<ref name="strangecapsule" /> The strange capsule can be picked up and placed around the farm. It turns into a broken Empty Capsule after about three days, unless placed inside of storage container such as a [[chest]], preventing it from breaking unless it is taken out. If the capsule is broken, it enables a [[Secrets#Strange Capsule|further Easter egg]]. It can also turn into a broken Empty Capsule if applied with [[Fairy Dust]]. Once this event has happened in a save file, it cannot happen again.
  
 
The Strange Capsule cannot spawn on the [[Ginger Island]] farm, but the event may still happen while sleeping in the [[Island Farmhouse]]. In this case, the Strange Capsule will appear as usual in a random location on the mainland farm.
 
The Strange Capsule cannot spawn on the [[Ginger Island]] farm, but the event may still happen while sleeping in the [[Island Farmhouse]]. In this case, the Strange Capsule will appear as usual in a random location on the mainland farm.

entry.title: Garbage Hat
entry.summary:
Fixed typo

← Older revision Revision as of 03:52, 11 April 2024
Line 4: Line 4:
 
|source      = [[Garbage Can]]s
 
|source      = [[Garbage Can]]s
 
}}
 
}}
−
The '''Garbage Hat''' is a [[Hats|hat]] that can be obtained from checking [[Garbage Can|garbage cans]] in [[Pelican Town|town]]. It has a 0.2% chance to be found after opening at least 20 garbage cans. This can be increased by using the powers from the book [[The Alleyway Buffet]] <ref name="checkAction" />  
+
The '''Garbage Hat''' is a [[Hats|hat]] that can be obtained from checking [[Garbage Can|garbage cans]] in [[Pelican Town|town]]. It has a 0.2% chance to be found after opening at least 20 garbage cans. This can be increased by using the powers from the book [[The Alleyway Buffet]]. <ref name="checkAction" />  
  
 
Upon obtaining the hat, an explosion sound plays, and the lid of the garbage can goes flying off. The garbage can remains without its lid for a short time afterwards.
 
Upon obtaining the hat, an explosion sound plays, and the lid of the garbage can goes flying off. The garbage can remains without its lid for a short time afterwards.

entry.title: Weather
entry.summary:
Storm: Added info on coal tree

← Older revision Revision as of 03:51, 11 April 2024
Line 72: Line 72:
 
===Storm===
 
===Storm===
 
*It always rains on stormy days. [[Fish]] that require rain can be caught on stormy days, and the [[Old Mariner]] will appear on stormy days.  
 
*It always rains on stormy days. [[Fish]] that require rain can be caught on stormy days, and the [[Old Mariner]] will appear on stormy days.  
−
*During a storm, lightning strikes can destroy random tiles on the farm. This includes [[crops]] and [[trees]]. If a [[Fruit Trees|Fruit Tree]] is hit, it will temporarily change into a coal tree.
+
*During a storm, lightning strikes can destroy random tiles on the farm. This includes [[crops]] and [[trees]]. If a [[Fruit Trees|Fruit Tree]] is hit, it will temporarily change into a coal tree, producing coal instead of the usual [[fruit]] that would otherwise be given.
 
**If lightning hits a tile with a crafted [[Crafting#Decor|flooring or path]] on it, the flooring or path will be displaced but not permanently destroyed.
 
**If lightning hits a tile with a crafted [[Crafting#Decor|flooring or path]] on it, the flooring or path will be displaced but not permanently destroyed.
 
*There is a chance for a lightning strike to occur every 10 minutes.
 
*There is a chance for a lightning strike to occur every 10 minutes.

entry.title: Greenhouse
entry.summary:
Added information on moving greenhouse

← Older revision Revision as of 03:38, 11 April 2024
Line 9: Line 9:
 
}}
 
}}
  
−
The '''Greenhouse''' is a building present on the farm from the start. It is initially in a state of disrepair, making it unusable. It can be repaired by completing the [[Bundles#Pantry|Pantry Bundles]] for the [[Community Center]] or by purchasing "Greenhouse" from the [[Joja Community Development Form]] for {{price|35000}}. Once repaired, it can be moved at the [[Carpenter's Shop]].
+
The '''Greenhouse''' is a building present on the farm from the start. It is initially in a state of disrepair, making it unusable. It can be repaired by completing the [[Bundles#Pantry|Pantry Bundles]] for the [[Community Center]] or by purchasing "Greenhouse" from the [[Joja Community Development Form]] for {{price|35000}}. Once repaired, it can be moved by talking to [[Robin]] at the [[Carpenter's Shop]].
  
 
==Basics==
 
==Basics==

+
* The [[Axes|axe]], [[scythe]], or [[Pickaxes|pickaxe]] can be used to kill [[monsters]] in lieu of a weapon.
 
* Stone can be purchased from the [[Carpenter's Shop]] for {{Price|20}} each during Year 1, making it possible to skip all 120 floors using [[Staircase]]s for just under {{Price|225000}} (useful for unlocking all the floors in order to return later).
 
* Stone can be purchased from the [[Carpenter's Shop]] for {{Price|20}} each during Year 1, making it possible to skip all 120 floors using [[Staircase]]s for just under {{Price|225000}} (useful for unlocking all the floors in order to return later).
 
**Starting in Year 2, the price of stone increases to {{Price|100}}, making this a much more expensive technique ({{Price|1125000}}).
 
**Starting in Year 2, the price of stone increases to {{Price|100}}, making this a much more expensive technique ({{Price|1125000}}).

entry.title: Garbage Hat
entry.summary:
← Older revision Revision as of 03:22, 11 April 2024
Line 4: Line 4:
 
|source      = [[Garbage Can]]s
 
|source      = [[Garbage Can]]s
 
}}
 
}}
−
The '''Garbage Hat''' is a [[Hats|hat]] that can be obtained from checking [[Garbage Can|garbage cans]] in [[Pelican Town|town]]. It has a 0.2% chance to be found after opening at least 20 garbage cans.<ref name="checkAction" />  
+
The '''Garbage Hat''' is a [[Hats|hat]] that can be obtained from checking [[Garbage Can|garbage cans]] in [[Pelican Town|town]]. It has a 0.2% chance to be found after opening at least 20 garbage cans. This can be increased by using the powers from the book [[The Alleyway Buffet]] <ref name="checkAction" />  
  
 
Upon obtaining the hat, an explosion sound plays, and the lid of the garbage can goes flying off. The garbage can remains without its lid for a short time afterwards.
 
Upon obtaining the hat, an explosion sound plays, and the lid of the garbage can goes flying off. The garbage can remains without its lid for a short time afterwards.

==Trivia==
 
*The power from this book can result in the player receiving types of roe which are otherwise unobtainable, namely [[Fish#Legendary Fish|Legendary Fish]], [[Fish#Legendary Fish II|Legendary Fish II]], [[Squid]], and [[Midnight Squid]] roes.
 
*The power from this book can result in the player receiving types of roe which are otherwise unobtainable, namely [[Fish#Legendary Fish|Legendary Fish]], [[Fish#Legendary Fish II|Legendary Fish II]], [[Squid]], and [[Midnight Squid]] roes.
 +
 +
*It is also important to mention that since Legendary Fish and Legendary Fish II can only be caught once per save file, or per player save in [[Multiplayer]], the [[Roe]] associated with them also can only be obtained once per save file per Legendary Fish.

entry.title: Dried Fruit
entry.summary:
Strategy: Fixed typos

← Older revision Revision as of 02:58, 11 April 2024
Line 34: Line 34:
  
 
==Strategy==
 
==Strategy==
−
You may thought about kegs vs dehydrator, the reality is that on early game, you should buy the recipe and start puting blueberries, cranberries and in general multi harvest crops that would require a ton of kegs or preserved jars instead, this can be a great early source of money, you can get 400 gold per dried blueberries. On end game dehydrator is not recommended except for raisins, because you have the mats for lot of kegs and lot of space to put them, so instead of the 2.1x + 7 you´ll get with dehydrator+artisan you can get a 4.2x with kegs
+
You may have thought about using kegs vs. dehydrator. The reality is that in the early game, you should buy the dehydrator recipe and start putting in blueberries and cranberries. In general, use multi harvest crops that would require a ton of kegs or preserved jars instead. This can be a great early game source of money. You can get 400 gold per dried blueberries. In the end game, dehydrator is not recommended to be used instead of kegs except for when creating raisins. This is because you'll likely have more materials for kegs and more available space to place them. So instead of the 2.1x + 7 multiplier with dehydrator+artisan, you can get a 4.2x multiplier with kegs
  
 
==Tailoring==
 
==Tailoring==

entry.title: Starfruit
entry.summary:
Undo revision 165640 by FranMegalodonte (talk) strategy usually isn't on the wiki.

← Older revision Revision as of 01:32, 11 April 2024
Line 71: Line 71:
 
==Tailoring==
 
==Tailoring==
 
Starfruit can be used in the spool of the [[2 Willow Lane#Sewing Machine|Sewing Machine]] to create the dyeable [[Tailoring#Pants|Genie Pants]]. [[File:Genie Pants.png|36px]] It can be used in [[dyeing]], serving as a yellow dye at the dye pots, located in [[Emily]]'s and [[Haley]]'s house, [[2 Willow Lane]].
 
Starfruit can be used in the spool of the [[2 Willow Lane#Sewing Machine|Sewing Machine]] to create the dyeable [[Tailoring#Pants|Genie Pants]]. [[File:Genie Pants.png|36px]] It can be used in [[dyeing]], serving as a yellow dye at the dye pots, located in [[Emily]]'s and [[Haley]]'s house, [[2 Willow Lane]].
−
 
−
==Strategy==
 
−
There are a few topics to cover in regard to starfruit throughout all your gameplay. First, its crucial to complete the vault or buy the bus repair at joja´s on year 1 to get access to a harvest on the first summer, on this early stage you may not be able to keg them or not even jelly them, but dehydrator is a good choice, wood is cheap to buy on year 1 and fire quartz is easily gotten on the mines, making this a great way to make a few hundred thousand on the first summer for lots of stuff.
 
−
In regard to money, on the late game it can be the best way to achieve perfection, its high yield of money per space and per time makes it so that only 4000 wine with artisan is needed for golden clock + obelisks, so a 400 kegs, 10-20 iridium sprinklers and a year or so of harvesting and plating on ginger island is an easy fast and safe way to get millions of gold.
 
−
To conclude, you may think of aging your wine, this is not usually recommended, if you harverst a really huge amount of starfruit, just age the amount you can and sell the rest, if not you´ll be hoarding wine and not making profit needed for other things (Upgrading tools, buying buildings, etc).
 
  
 
==Quests==
 
==Quests==
